SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Strategy

Class BossShieldStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Strategy.BossShieldStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
BossShielding
public class BossShieldStrategy extends Object implements BossShielding
Implements the BossShielding interface which manages shielding mechanics for boss plane.

    • BossShieldStrategy

      public BossShieldStrategy(ComponentsFactory factory, BossHealthBar bossHealthBar, double x, double y)

  • Method Details

    • updateShield

      public void updateShield(Boss boss)
      Updates shield status of bossplane. If shield is active, it increments the frame counter and deactivates shield if maximum duration is reached. If shield is inactive, it increments cooldown counter and activates shield if cooldown period has passed and activation probability is met.
      Specified by:
      updateShield in interface BossShielding
      Parameters:
      boss - : Bossplane whose shield status is to be updated.

    • applyShieldEffect

      public void applyShieldEffect(Boss boss)
      Applies shield effect to bossplane. If shield is active, it shows the shield icon at the right side of boss's healthbar, applies glowing effect to bossplane. If shield is inactive, it hides the shield icon, removes the glow effect on bossplane.
      Specified by:
      applyShieldEffect in interface BossShielding
      Parameters:
      boss - : Bossplane which the shield effect is to be applied.

    • isShielded

      public boolean isShielded()
      Checks if bossplane is shielded.
      Specified by:
      isShielded in interface BossShielding
      Returns:
      true: if bossplane is shielded, false otherwise.

    • shieldExhausted

      private boolean shieldExhausted()
      Checks if bossplane shield's duration has been exhausted.
      Returns:
      true: if bossplane's shield has been activated for maximum number of frames, false otherwise.

    • shouldActivateShield

      private boolean shouldActivateShield()
      Checks if bossplane shield should activate based on probabilistic check.
      Returns:
      true: if bossplane shield should activate, false otherwise.

    • activateShield

      protected void activateShield()
      Activates bossplane shield and resets frame counter.

    • deactivateShield

      protected void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates bossplane shield and resets frame counters.
